name: INTransferMoneyIntentResponse

items.name: init(code: INTransferMoneyIntentResponseCode, userActivity: NSUserActivity?)
items.desc: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity object.

items.name: var code: INTransferMoneyIntentResponseCode
items.desc: The code indicating whether you successfully handled the intent.

items.name: enum INTransferMoneyIntentResponseCode
items.desc: Constants indicating the state of the response.

items.name: var fromAccount: INPaymentAccount?
items.desc: The user account providing the funds.

items.name: var toAccount: INPaymentAccount?
items.desc: The user account receiving the funds.

items.name: var transactionAmount: INPaymentAmount?
items.desc: The amount of money to transfer between accounts.

items.name: var transactionScheduledDate: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The date on which the transfer is to occur.

items.name: var transactionNote: String?
items.desc: Notes to include with the transaction.

items.name: var transferFee: INCurrencyAmount?
items.desc: The fee charged for performing the transaction.
